009package Ch25_SIFT;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
012
013import ij.ImagePlus;
014import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
015import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
016import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
017import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
018import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
019import imagingbook.common.sift.SiftDetector;
020import imagingbook.common.sift.scalespace.DogScaleSpace;
021import imagingbook.common.sift.scalespace.GaussianScaleSpace;
022import imagingbook.sampleimages.SiftSampleImage;
023
024/**
025 * <p>
026 * This ImageJ plugin visualizes the hierarchical scale space structures used
027 * for SIFT feature detection (see {@link SiftDetector}). Optionally the
028 * Gaussian scale space or the derived DoG scale space (or both) are shown. Each
029 * scale space octave is displayed as an image stack, with one frame for each
030 * scale level. See Ch. 25 of [1] for details.
031 * </p>
032 * <p>
033 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
034 * Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
035 * </p>
036 * 
037 * @author WB
038 * @version 2022/11/23
039 */
040public class Show_Scale_Space implements PlugInFilter {
041        
042        private static boolean ShowGaussianScaleSpace = true;
043        private static boolean ShowDoGScaleSpace = false;
044        
045        /**
046         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image
047         * is currently open.
048         */
049        public Show_Scale_Space() {
050                if (noCurrentImage()) {
051                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(SiftSampleImage.Castle);
052                }
053        }
054        
055        // ---------------------------------------------------
056
057        @Override
058        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus arg1) {
059                return DOES_8G + DOES_32 + NO_CHANGES;
060        }
061        
062        @Override
063        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
064                if (!runDialog()) {
065                        return;
066                }
067                
068                if (!ShowGaussianScaleSpace && !ShowDoGScaleSpace) {
069                        return;
070                }
071                
072                FloatProcessor fp = (FloatProcessor) ip.convertToFloat();
073                SiftDetector detector = new SiftDetector(fp);
074                if (ShowGaussianScaleSpace) {
075                        GaussianScaleSpace gss = detector.getGaussianScaleSpace();
076                        ImagePlus[] images = gss.getImages("Gaussian");
077                        for (ImagePlus im : images) {
078                                im.show();
079                        }
080                }
081                
082                if (ShowDoGScaleSpace) {
083                        DogScaleSpace dss = detector.getDogScaleSpace();
084                        ImagePlus[] images = dss.getImages("DoG");
085                        for (ImagePlus im : images) {
086                                im.show();
087                        }
088                }
089        }
090        
091        // ---------------------------
092        
093        private boolean runDialog() {
094                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
095                gd.addCheckbox("Show Gaussian scale space)", ShowGaussianScaleSpace);
096                gd.addCheckbox("Show DoG scale space)", ShowDoGScaleSpace);
097                
098                gd.showDialog();
099                if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
100                        return false;
101                }
102                
103                ShowGaussianScaleSpace = gd.getNextBoolean();
104                ShowDoGScaleSpace = gd.getNextBoolean();
105                return true;
106        }
107
108}
